mapper.select: select from TB4D_DATASET ORDER by DS_ORDER_NUM DESC
select case when max(DS_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(DS_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TB4D_DATASET
select * from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ORDER_NUM = (select max(DS_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ORDER_NUM<(select DS_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select * from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ORDER_NUM = (select min(DS_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ORDER_NUM>(select DS_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
